text: jasin-ui anaedeul-ege ‘dangsin-eun nae eomeoniui deung-gwa gatso’ lago malhan hu geudeul-i malhan geos-e daehae beonboghaneun jadeul-eun geu dul-i seolo mom-eul jeobchoghagi jeon-e noye haebang(i uimu)ila. igeos-eul tonghayeo geudaedeul-eun gyohun-eul eod-eul geos-ila. hananimkkeseoneun geudaedeul-i haenghaneun il-e balg-eusin bun-ila
